codes.ADEA: Received after the servicer's deadline. Processed on best effort basis
codes.DISA: Exceptional closing of all financial institutions due to natural disaster, for example, earthquake
codes.LPRO: Longer processing timeframe for this type of SSI
codes.MINF: Information, for example, currency is missing
codes.NEWI: Financial instrument is a new issue and not yet available/tradable
codes.NEXT: Next process is launched. No processing pending problems to be reported
codes.NSTP: Instruction was not straight through processing and had to be processed manually
codes.PRSY: Transaction was put on hold/frozen by the system

description: Specifies the reason for pending status.
name: ExternalPendingProcessingReason1Code
